description: These festive crunchy almond cookie are a German classic.
name: Zimtsterne Cookie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium egg, egg white only needed

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 160°C/140°C fan-forced. In a mixing bowl, beat the egg white and lemon juice until peaks appear.
Incremently add the icing sugar and beat until peaks appear again. Take out about one quarter of the mix and set aside for the moment.
Add the rest of the ingredients to the mixer to combine fully and allow to set for 10 minutes.
Roll out your dough and shape into as many star shapes as possible, you should be able to get about 10.
Prepare a baking tray with some baking paper and place the starts on it.
Now with the remaining meringue over the top of the stars evenly.
Bake in the oven for 15 minutes or until the meringue on top starts to brown nicely.
